titles.title: Congratulating Geno Auriemma, the University of Connecticut women's basketball head coach, upon his selection to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in Springfield, Massachusetts.
Congratulating Geno Auriemma, the University of Connecticut women's basketball head coach, upon his selection to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in Springfield, Massachusetts.

bill.summary: Congratulates Geno Auriemma, the University of Connecticut women’s basketball head coach, for his selection to the 2006 Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame Enshrinement Class.
